languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: This armour deals 10-15 piercing damage (with armour penetration of 5%) to any target in melee range when the wielder makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 deflection if the wielder's Weapon Skill is more than 65.

This armour deals 10-15 piercing damage (with armour penetration of 5%) to any target in melee range when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 deflection if the wearer's Weapon Skill is more than 65.

This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

languages.text: Esta {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} inflige (de 10 a 15) de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 5 %) a cualquier objetivo al {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance del cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} cuando el portador lanza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo. Propiedad básica de armadura: +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del portador es de más de 65.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} inflige 10-15 de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 5 %) a cualquier objetivo al {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}alcance del cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} cuando el portador lanza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo. Propiedad básica de armadura: +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del portador es de más de 65.

languages.text: 当装备者进行近战攻击时，此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}会对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的所有目标造成10-15点{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}（拥有5%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}高于65，获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者进行近战攻击时，此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}会对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的所有目标造成10-15点{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}（拥有5%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}高于65，获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} inflige (entre 10 et 15) points de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 5 %) à toute cible située à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g} lorsque l'utilisateur lance une attaque de mêlée. Propriété d'armure de base : +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 65.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} inflige (entre 10 et 15) points de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 5 %) à toute cible située à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g} lorsque l'utilisateur lance une attaque de mêlée. Propriété d'armure de base : +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 65.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Nahkampfangriff ausführt, verursacht diese {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bei jedem Ziel in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} (10 bis 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g} (mit 5 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}). Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} des Trägers höher als 65 ist.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: Falls der Träger einen Nahkampfangriff ausführt, fügt diese {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} 10-15 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g} (mit {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} von 5 %) zu, und zwar jedem Ziel in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} des Trägers höher als 65 ist.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は、着用者が近接攻撃を行ったとき、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}範囲内のターゲットに10～15の{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}貫通ダメージ{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}は5%）を与える。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}が65以上だと、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}+3
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}は、使用者が近接攻撃を行った場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接範囲{/g}のターゲットのいずれかに10-15の{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}貫通ダメージ{/g} (5%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}) を与える。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が65以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} +3

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, этот доспех наносит всем целям в радиусе 1 клетки (от 10 до 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 5%. Базовое свойство: +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} больше 65.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: При совершении {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} этот доспех наносит цели 10–15 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 5%. Базовое свойство: +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} больше 65.

При совершении {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} этот доспех наносит цели 10–15 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 5%. Базовое свойство: +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} больше 65.

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, giyen kişi bir yakın dövüş saldırısı yaptığında {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzili{/g} içindeki herhangi bir hedefe (10 ila 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}delme hasarı{/g} (%5 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahiptir) verir. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliği 65'ten yüksekse +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.
